20180716.review_text: Spam operative that just won't stop trying to contact us despite being told we're not interested. Sends spam through gmail and other free mail accounts to hide identity then identifies themselves when you respond positively to them. Never ever employ their services unless you like supporting Indian based scammers that operate illegally.
